name: What The Rock
description:
An addicting game to test your reflexes. Build a rhythm in a fun simple race against time!

[How to play]
> Get to the next checkpoint before time runs out.
> Don't step in the water.

Two Modes:
> Play in the Lazy River for practice or simply to relax and enjoy the game
> Jump into the Fast Rapids to earn the best score and beat all your friends!

Good luck!
Have fun!
Tell us what you think: whattherockgame@gmail.com

-----------
Sound effects:
Water Splash by Mike Koenig
